titles.title: A bill to improve the safety of infant formula through testing of infant formula for microorganisms and toxic elements, and for other purposes.
A bill to improve the safety of infant formula through testing of infant formula for microorganisms and toxic elements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
